Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the retiree earnings cap for health care officials and workers during a declared public health related state of emergency declared by the governor
Summary: Relates to the retiree earnings cap for health care officials and workers during a declared public health related state of emergency declared by the governor.
LawCode: Amd ยง212, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the retiree earnings cap for health care officials and workers during a declared public health related state of emergency
